landing package¶

Subpackages¶

Submodules¶

landing.admin module¶

landing admin.py

This script defines the admin site for developers to use to amend the data stored. It uses django’s admin.site.register() method

landing.apps module¶

Landing apps.py

This script defines configurations for the landing application.

class landing.apps.LandingConfig(app_name, app_module)¶

Bases: django.apps.config.AppConfig

defines configurations for the landing application.
